title: The Rider Named Death | HISTORICAL FILM

sources.title: The Rider Named Death | HISTORICAL FILM
sources.description:
Russia in the early twentieth century. Terrorists plot to assassinate prominent statesmen. Their main goal is the assassination of Grand Duke of Russia. The assassination attempt is being prepared by members of the Militant Organization, led by its leader Georges. The process of organizing a terrorist attack reveals the psyche, feelings, and aspirations of terrorists, each one having different reasons for doing what they do. The assassination attempts fail one after another, and almost all of its organizers get killed. Survivor Georges suddenly realizes that the assassination of Grand Duke of Russia has become the sole purpose of his life, and he will go to any lengths to carry out his plan. He commits a daring murder but ends up being disappointed. 

Year of production: 2004

Directed by: Karen Shakhnazarov 
Written by: Aleksandr Borodyansky, Karen Shakhnazarov
Director of photography: Vladimir Klimov
Music: Anatoly Kroll 
Production designer: Lyudmila Kusakova 
Starring: Andrei Panin, Dmitriy Dyuzhev, Artem Semakin, Kseniya Rappoport, Anastasia Makeeva
